indexFieldName.description: The name of a field in the search index.

indexFieldType.description: The type of field. Based on this type, exactly one of the UIntOptions, LiteralOptions, TextOptions must be present.

uIntOptions.description: The synapse id that this link points to.

literalOptions.description: Options for literal field. Present if IndexFieldType specifies the field is of type literal.

textOptions.description: Options for text field. Present if IndexFieldType specifies the field is of type text.
